title: Banking for Financial Goals
instructions: Learn how to align your banking choices with your financial goals.

sections.title: Goal-Oriented Banking
sections.content: Different financial goals require different banking strategies and account types...

sections.title: Match Goals to Account Types
sections.instructions: For each financial goal, identify the best account type and why.

sections.title: Banking Strategy Tips
sections.content:
• Use high-yield savings for goals 1-5 years out
• Consider CDs for time-locked goals
• Use checking accounts for daily expenses only
• Leverage bank bonuses for new accounts strategically

key_takeaways: Match account types to time horizons
High-yield savings work best for short to medium-term goals
Don't use long-term investment accounts for short-term goals
Consider both returns and liquidity needs
